Description.Text: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Chelsea, My Apartments Kensington Hogarth promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, fax machine, printer, private check in/check out, express check-in/check-out, are at hand. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like internet access â€“ wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, desk, fan. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting London, My Apartments Kensington Hogarth will make you feel instantly at home.
